content.title: Dai Didi Mobile Clinic Scheme
content.beneficiary: Women and girls living in rural areas
content.details: Dai Didi Clinic Scheme is an important welfare scheme of the Government of Chhattisgarh. This scheme is to provide medical help to those women and girls living in rural areas who do not go to the doctor due to lack of time or many other reasons, but now midwives provide them treatment facilities, through female friends and medical staff near home. And she can get her treatment done through female staff without humid.
eligibility: The beneficiary should be a resident of Chhattisgarh
content.application_process: Offline. Beneficiaries do not need to apply anywhere for Chhattisgarh Dai Didi Clinic Scheme. Under this scheme the medical aid will reach at the doorstep of the beneficiaries themselves. Camps will be organized in the entire state of Chhattisgarh through mobile medical units. The vehicle of the Mobile Medical Unit along with women doctors and women nursing staff will render their services in the camp. Beneficiaries will have to go to the Mobile Medical Unit in their municipal corporation/village area.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Government of Chhattisgarh state, started a scheme named 'Dai Didi Clinic Scheme' in 2020 for women and girl health.

faqs.question: What are the benefits under this scheme?
faqs.answer: 1. Free checkup. 2. Free treatment. 3. Free consultation. 4. Free medicine distribution.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits of this scheme?
faqs.answer: All the Female of Chhattisgarh state.

faqs.question: Is this scheme also open to men for its benefits?
faqs.answer: No, this is only for Female.

faqs.question: How to get the benefits?
faqs.answer: Camps will be organized in the entire state of Chhattisgarh through mobile medical units and Beneficiaries will have to go to the Mobile Medical Unit in their municipal corporation/village area.

faqs.question: Is there any online or offline procedure to apply?
faqs.answer: No, there is no apply procedure for the scheme.

faqs.question: Can other state woman also get the benefit of the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, This is only for Chhattisgarh state.
